adverbs.description: ingenuously (comparative more ingenuously, superlative most ingenuously)

entries.meaning: In an ingenuous manner; frankly, straightforwardly.
examples: I must ingenuously acknowledge the chief Motive of my leaving her was the Present of a New-Year's-Gift she made me; but whether French or Neopolitan, I leave to the Determination of the Sons of Galen.
